basics.name: Zukisa Maza
basics.label: Aspiring Fullstack Developer
basics.summary: Hello! I'm Eric Zukisa Maza, I'm a keen learner and believe in an interdisciplinary approach to understanding the world. I am an ordinary person who has been blessed with extraordinary experiences. I'm a Xhosa guy who once studied Computer Science at the University of Western Cape, but not that long due to finances. Now I'm a good FullStack DEV at Life_Choices.

work.summary:
Currently enrolled in a 12 months Coding course. Skills offered:
- Learning modern web languages
- Chance to develop future orientated skills (emerging opportunities)
- Gain Confidence
- Gain confidence in being able to assess problems and design solutions.
- Team Work
- Learn how to work cohesively in a team and get practice with the tools used in the professional industry.
- Marketable Skills
- Relevant technical skills for the 21st century.
- Problem Solving
- Learn critical and abstract thinking to address relevant issues.
- Social Awareness
- Use web skills as a means for social impact.

Web dev Assistant & Data Scientist. As a web developer assistant at umuzi.org, you were involved in supporting the design, construction, and maintenance of websites and web applications. Your responsibilities may have included writing code, creating website layouts, and integrating data from back-end services and databases. You may have also worked on various projects as part of a team. Employers typically look for candidates with relevant skills, experience, and accomplishments in web development. A compelling summary of your experience could highlight specific skills, such as proficiency in web development languages, frameworks, and tools, as well as any specialties, such as front-end, back-end, or full-stack development. It's also important to showcase any significant projects or achievements. When crafting your summary, aim for a concise two to three-sentence description that emphasizes your most relevant skills, experience, and accomplishments
Shop Assistant. Assisted with the daily operations around the shop, namely stock-taking, pricing and assisting customers with their needs.

I was employed as a storeman at Robertson and Caine, where I was responsible for managing the supply of cables and electrical components. During my tenure, I effectively handled inventory, organized the storage of electrical supplies, and contributed to the smooth functioning of the electrical supply department.

skills.summary: Python and JavaScript are two popular programming languages used in the coding world. Python is a high-level, object-oriented programming language that is widely used for back-end development, scientific purposes, and a wide range of applications. JavaScript, on the other hand, is a scripting language mainly used for web development, both front-end and back-end. Python is more beginner-friendly and easier to learn than JavaScript, which has a steeper learning curve. Python provides easy code readability and maintainability, while JavaScript is more flexible.

In summary, combining web development, Figma, and Bootstrap allows for a streamlined and efficient process for designing and building web applications. Developers can leverage the power of Figma for design and prototyping, while using Bootstrap to style and layout web applications with a consistent and responsive layout.

Vue 3 is a JavaScript framework for building user interfaces that builds on top of standard HTML, CSS, and JavaScript and provides a declarative and component-based programming model that helps you efficiently develop simple or complex applications. Vue 3 has several new features, including a faster and smaller file size, better TypeScript support, and a built-in Composition API.

skills.position: MongoDB, Node.js, Express, Django, Next.js, MySQL
skills.summary: MySQL is a popular relational database management system (RDBMS) developed by Oracle. It is widely used by businesses for mission-critical applications. MySQL supports a wide variety of data structures, from standard logical, numeric, and alphanumeric types to more advanced JSON or geospatial data. The ecosystem includes tools for server management, reporting, and data analysis.

Data wrangling, also known as data munging, is the process of transforming and mapping data from its raw form into another format with the intent of making it more appropriate and valuable for a variety of downstream purposes, such as analytics.
 Linear algebra is a branch of mathematics that deals with vector spaces and linear mappings between these spaces. It is a fundamental tool in the field of data science, machine learning, and statistics. Multi-linear algebra, on the other hand, extends the concepts of vectors and matrices to more than two dimensions. It is essential for understanding and working with multi-dimensional arrays and tensors, which are prevalent in various data science and machine learning applications.

Kali Linux is a Debian-based open-source operating system designed for advanced penetration testing and security auditing. It contains over 600 pre-installed cybersecurity tools and applications, including those for vulnerability analysis, information gathering, web application penetration testing, exploitation, wireless attacks, network security auditing, and more.
